about_the_game:
Toy Rider is a car racing game, what makes it different from a typical car racing game is, it is not just about speed it is about balancing, timing, proper use of power-ups & proper speed! The game is inspired by the Table Top Racing & Micromachine game but with lots of upgrades and improvements. One of the best racing game

Racing Game Features :
- Miniature home environment graphics
- 100+ Unique Cars
- 10 crazy power-ups
- 24+ race tracks
- Off road racing
- Play offline (no wifi required racing game)
- Lot's of rewards & gifts
- Customize and upgrade your cars
- Sports cars, F1 racers, Monster trucks, Planes & more
- Race with planes & helicopter
- Race with Kart & buggy cars
- Lots of Cars 2 unlock
- Fast Car games action
- Crash of cars
- Fast & Furious action adventure
- Real car driving experience
- Best racing game for girls
- Arcade racing

Themes :
- Bedroom (various bedroom tracks to play with)
- Kitchen (various kitchen tracks to play with)
- Bathroom (various bathroom tracks to play with)
- Beach Track (various beach levels to play with)


Power-ups :
- Fireball Attack (make your opponent's wheels go hot)
- Freeze ball attack (make your opponent go ice)
- Nitros boost (nitro boost racing)
- Slow down (slow your opponent's car)
- Summon Bull (turn your car into a raging bull)
- Summon Horse (turn your car into a Horse to beat your opponent)
- Summon Tank (turn your car into a military tank)
- Call the police (call the police and they will catch other racers)
- Call the Kid (call the crazy boy racer to irritate your opponents)
- Call JohnWick (call him and he will make sure you will win)


Cars :
- Casual cars
- Supercars
- Traffic Rider cars
- John wick cars
- Monster trucks
- F1 racing cars
- Planes & helicopters
- And many more super fun cars to unlock


Note:
We tried to create the best possible car racing gaming experience, so if you like it then please download and don't forget to leave your valuable feedback as comments, Thank you!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.4Ghz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB video card memory
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.9
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.4Ghz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB video card memory
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

name: Toy Rider

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU 2Ghz or faster processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compliant with 512MB of video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU 2Ghz or faster processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compliant with 512MB of video RAM.
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Toy Rider is a fast paced action car racing game with lots of powerups, tracks, vehicles, adventures, and more. It's not just about speed it's about balancing, timing, proper use of powerups & high speed. Get ready to race against the most ruthless AI in the world, Start your engines now!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Hindi
